short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: page css ruler;page measure tools;Get page's/element's size/margin/padding/spacing info

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Measure the size of the element and the spacing between elements on webpage. Hold down Alt (Windows) / Option (Mac) key, and move the cursor on the target element.
